scripts.update: npm run rebuild:all && npm run install:all
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:package functions && npm run install:package web && npm run install:package shared && npm run install:package scripts && npm run install:package shared-admin
scripts.rebuild:all: npm rebuild && npm run rebuild:package functions && npm run rebuild:package web && npm run rebuild:package shared && npm run rebuild:package scripts && npm run rebuild:package shared-admin
scripts.compile:all: tsc -p web/ && tsc -p shared/ && tsc -p functions && tsc -p scripts
scripts.add:all:dev: func() { echo "installing $1 $2" ;npm --prefix "web" install $1 --save-dev;npm --prefix "shared-admin" install $1 --save-dev;npm --prefix "functions" install $1 --save-dev;npm --prefix "shared" install $1 --save-dev;npm --prefix "scripts" install $1 --save-dev; }; func
scripts.add:all:prod: func() { echo "installing $1 $2" ;npm --prefix "web" install $1 --save;npm --prefix "shared-admin" install $1 --save;npm --prefix "functions" install $1 --save;npm --prefix "shared" install $1 --save;npm --prefix "scripts" install $1 --save; }; func
